files.name: m1.json
files.label: M1
files.description: M1 represents the money supply, including cash and checking deposits.

files.name: m2.json
files.label: M2
files.description: M2 includes all of M1 plus savings accounts, money market accounts, and small time deposits.

files.name: sahm.json
files.label: Sahm Recession
files.description: The Sahm Recession Indicator signals the onset of a recession based on unemployment trends.

files.name: debt.json
files.label: Debt GDP Ratio
files.description: Shows the ratio of national debt to Gross Domestic Product (GDP).

files.name: interest_payments.json
files.label: Fed Interest Payments
files.description: Total interest payments made by the Federal Reserve.

files.name: totalassets.json
files.label: Fed Total Assets
files.description: Total assets held by the Federal Reserve.

files.name: fedfunds.json
files.label: Fed Funds Rate
files.description: The interest rate at which depository institutions trade federal funds with each other overnight.

files.name: cpi_yoy.json
files.label: CPI YoY
files.description: Consumer Price Index Year-over-Year measures inflation based on average price changes.

files.name: unemployment.json
files.label: Unemployment Rate
files.description: Percentage of the labor force that is unemployed and actively seeking employment.

files.name: unfilled_vacancies.json
files.label: Unfilled Vacancies
files.description: Number of available job positions that are not filled.

files.name: housing.json
files.label: Housing Starts
files.description: Number of new residential construction projects begun over a specific period.

files.name: eu.json
files.label: Euro
files.description: Exchange rate of the Euro against the U.S. Dollar.

files.name: oil.json
files.label: Oil
files.description: Price of Brent Crude Oil per barrel.
